\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage[english]{babel}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\begin{document}
\begin{center}
\text{Cryptographic keys (finite fields) are not uniformaly distributed across all possible sizes,} \\\ \text{but rather organized into packages (512, 1024, 2048, 3072, 4096 bits).}
\end{center}
\end{document}
